education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialized in software engineering, algorithms, and artificial intelligence, with a focus on practical applications. Conducted research on integrating AI into computer science education while serving as a teaching assistant for Python programming courses.

onlineCourses.name: Associate Data Engineer in SQL
onlineCourses.instructor: Timo Grossenbacher, Lis Sulmont, and others
onlineCourses.description: Comprehensive course covering data engineering fundamentals, data modeling, data visualization,and cloud integration using SQL.

onlineCourses.name: SQL Fundamentals
onlineCourses.instructor: Mona Khalil, Fernando Gonzalez Prada, and others
onlineCourses.description: Comprehensive course covering SQL fundamentals, database design, and data manipulation.

onlineCourses.name: CompTIA A+ Core 1
onlineCourses.description: Comprehensive training covering PC hardware, mobile devices, networking technology, troubleshooting, and operating systems.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 13+, featuring dark mode, admin dashboard, and dynamic content management. Implements a two-layer security system and includes EmailJS integration for contact functionality.

projects.title: IT Ticketing System
projects.description: A full-stack IT ticketing system built in C# and ASP.NET Core. Features include user authentication, ticket creation, and management.

projects.title: IHSAA Scoring Website Prototype
projects.description: A prototype for a scoring website for the IHSAA (Indiana High School Athletic Association). Built with Angular, SQL Server, and Azure services for backend API integration and data storage. Demo unavailable as it contains sensitive information.

updates.title: Launched - Personal Portfolio Website
updates.content: Developed and launched my portfolio website using Next.js 13+, featuring dark mode, content management system, and EmailJS integration for contact functionality.
